snippet: Tomas Berdych saved three match points before upsetting the defending champion Roger Federer to earn a spot in the final of the Dubai Championships against Novak Djokovic.
abstract: Tomas Berdych beats Roger Federer to advance to Dubai Championships final; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tomas Berdych saved three match points before upsetting the defending champion Roger Federer to earn a spot in the final of the Dubai Championships against Novak Djokovic.

headline.seo: Tomas Berdych Upsets Roger Federer in Dubai
